node.excerpt:
Portrait of T. Steinheil inspired by a photograph on Sktchy. Digitally painted with Procreate on an iPad Air 2.

My confidence level with color hasn’t been high as of late, so I decided to retreat to working in black and white. Haven’t settled on a set of brushes I like 100% with Procreate yet, so things still have that oil painting look. To counter some of that “over blended-ness…
